condition.narrative: Financing Agreement :Schedule 2, Section I.A (a) | Description :The Recipient shall establish the Program Steering Committee. |Frequency :Monthly
Financing Agreement :Schedule 2, Section I.A (b) | Description :The Recipient shall nominate a representative to the ProgramSteering Committee | Frequency :Monthly

Financing Agreement :Schedule 2, Section I.A (c) | Description: Recipient shall establish and thereafter at all times maintainthroughout the Project implementation period, the National Steering Committee with powers and composition satisfactory toAssociation | Frequency: Monthly

Financing Agreement :Schedule 2, Section I.A (d) | Description: Recipient shall establish and thereafter maintain throughout theimplementation period, the Regional Procurement Evaluation Committee with powers and composition satisfactory to Association |Frequency: Monthly

Financing Agreement :Schedule 2, Section I.A (e) | Description: Recipient shall establish and thereafter at all times maintainthroughout the Project implementation period, the Project Support Team with powers and composition satisfactory to Association |Frequency :Monthly

Financing Agreement :Schedule 2, Section I.B.1 | Description: The Recipient shall enter into a Service Agreement with TAL underterms and conditions which shall have been approved by the Association. | Due Date :19-Apr-2012
Financing Agreement :Schedule 2, Section I.C. | Description: The Recipient shall adopt the Project Operations Manual, whichincludes the Financial Management Manual | Due Date: 19-Apr-2012
Financing Agreement :Schedule 2, Section I.F (b) (iii) | Description: The Recipient shall collect departure tax through airlinesoperating in the Recipient’s territory | Due Date: 30-Jun-2012

Financing Agreement: Schedule 2, Section I.F (a) | Description: The Recipient shall collect from departing international passengersa AUD5 equivalent levy for use to pay aviation safety and security expenditures | Due Date: 31-Dec-2012

Financing Agreement: Schedule 2, Section I.F (b) (i) | Description: The Recipient shall transfer fire tender assets from its PoliceDepartment to the Bonriki International Airport | Due Date: 30-Jun-2012

Financing Agreement: Schedule 2, Section I.F (b) (ii) | Description: The Recipient shall apply revenues from user fees charged fromairplanes using the Recipient’s upper airspace to finance aviation safety and security expenditures | Due Date: 30-Jun-2012

Financing Agreement: Schedule 2, Section I.F (b) (iv) | Description: The Recipient shall allocate 50% of the Recipient’s aviationrevenues towards aviation safety and security and operations | Due Date: 30-Jun-2012

Financing Agreement: Schedule 2, Section V.B.1 (b) | Description: No disbursements will be made out of the grant proceeds allocatedfor the operation of KAMO unless KAMO has been established in form an substance satisfactory to the Association. | Due Date:30-Jun-2014

title.narrative: Navigation and safety aids fully operational
2. State requirement for safety and security reaches global ICAO average
Achievement of Fire Safety Standards at Bonriki and Cassidy airports
Successful implementation of agreed training plan

actual.value: There is current plan under implementation.

title.narrative: 1. ICAO certification of safety and security at project airports
4. Implementation of a regional safety and security levy for international passengers
Separation of civil aviation regulatory functions from operations
Adoption of an Air Transport Master Plan
Award of contract for airport management and operations support

actual.value: ADS-B ground stations installed at TRW but not yet at CXI. VSAT has been installed, but not yet commissioned.
